tasks.title: Project Foundation Setup
tasks.description: Set up Next.js 15 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and essential dependencies
tasks.details: Configure Next.js 15 with App Router, TypeScript for type safety, Tailwind CSS for styling, and install essential dependencies like Framer Motion, React Hook Form, Zod, and Lucide React icons.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify development server starts without errors, TypeScript compilation works, and Tailwind CSS is properly configured

tasks.title: Design System Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the Peace Hub design system with colors, typography, and component classes
tasks.details: Create CSS custom properties for the color palette (Blue #4A7FFF, Yellow #FFD748, Orange #FF5733, Beige #FFF8E7), implement typography scale (H1: 120px to Small: 14px), and define component classes for buttons, cards, navigation, and forms.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all colors render correctly, typography scales properly, and component classes work across different screen sizes

tasks.title: Layout Component Structure
tasks.description: Create the main layout component with navigation and responsive design
tasks.details: Build the main Layout component that includes navigation, footer, and responsive design. Implement smooth scroll navigation and ensure mobile-first approach with proper breakpoints.
tasks.testStrategy: Test navigation on mobile and desktop, verify smooth scrolling works, and check responsive behavior across different screen sizes

tasks.title: Home Page Hero Section
tasks.description: Create the impactful hero section with headline, supporting text, and call-to-action buttons
tasks.details: Design and implement the hero section with large headline (120px), supporting text, and primary/secondary call-to-action buttons. Include smooth animations and ensure it's the first visible, impactful section.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify hero section loads quickly, animations are smooth, and call-to-action buttons are functional and accessible

tasks.title: Vision and Approach Sections
tasks.description: Implement the vision and approach sections that articulate Peace Hub's mission
tasks.details: Create sections that clearly communicate Peace Hub's mission, values, and how they cultivate peace through structured collaboration. Include engaging content and visual elements.
tasks.testStrategy: Review content for clarity and impact, test readability across devices, and verify visual hierarchy is clear

tasks.title: Programs and Testimonials Sections
tasks.description: Build sections showcasing current programs and community testimonials
tasks.details: Create programs section with overview of initiatives and testimonials section with stories from community members and partners. Include engaging layouts and visual elements.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify content is engaging, testimonials are properly formatted, and sections are visually appealing

tasks.title: About Us Page
tasks.description: Create the About Us page with founder's story, team grid, and organization timeline
tasks.details: Build About Us page including founder's personal narrative, team grid with photos and bios, organization timeline with milestones, and values/philosophy section.
tasks.testStrategy: Test page navigation, verify team grid displays correctly, and ensure timeline is properly formatted

tasks.title: Contact Form Implementation
tasks.description: Create contact form with validation and submission handling
tasks.details: Implement contact form with fields for name, email, subject, and message. Use React Hook Form with Zod validation for real-time feedback and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form validation, verify submission works, and check error handling and user feedback

tasks.title: Google Maps Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Google Maps API to show Peace Hub's location
tasks.details: Set up Google Maps API integration to display Peace Hub's location on the contact page. Include directions and proper API key management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify map loads correctly, location is accurate, and API key is properly secured

tasks.title: Legal Pages (Impressum & Datenschutz)
tasks.description: Create GDPR-compliant legal pages for German requirements
tasks.details: Create Impressum (legal notice) and Datenschutz (privacy policy) pages that are GDPR compliant. Include proper legal content and ensure accessibility.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify legal content is accurate, GDPR compliance is met, and pages are accessible

tasks.title: Reusable Component Library
tasks.description: Build a comprehensive library of reusable UI components
tasks.details: Create reusable components for buttons, cards, navigation, forms, modals, and other UI elements. Ensure consistency with design system and accessibility standards.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all components across different screen sizes, verify accessibility, and ensure consistent styling

tasks.title: Smooth Scroll Navigation
tasks.description: Implement enhanced navigation with smooth scrolling and parallax effects
tasks.details: Add smooth scroll navigation between sections and implement subtle parallax effects for depth and movement. Use Framer Motion for optimized animations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test smooth scrolling performance, verify parallax effects work smoothly, and check for any performance issues

tasks.title: Hover Animations and Micro-interactions
tasks.description: Add engaging hover animations and micro-interactions throughout the site
tasks.details: Implement hover animations for buttons, cards, and interactive elements. Add micro-interactions that enhance user experience without being distracting.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all hover animations, verify they're smooth and not jarring, and ensure they work on touch devices

tasks.title: Newsletter Subscription
tasks.description: Implement email newsletter subscription functionality
tasks.details: Create newsletter subscription form with email capture, consent management, and integration with email service. Include proper validation and user feedback.
tasks.testStrategy: Test subscription form, verify email capture works, and check consent management compliance

tasks.title: Loading States and Transitions
tasks.description: Add smooth loading states and page transitions
tasks.details: Implement loading states for forms, page transitions, and smooth feedback for user interactions. Ensure transitions are smooth and not jarring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all loading states, verify transitions are smooth, and check user feedback is clear and helpful

tasks.title: Accessibility Improvements
tasks.description: Ensure full WCAG 2.1 AA compliance throughout the application
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive accessibility features including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, proper ARIA labels, semantic HTML, and sufficient color contrast ratios.
tasks.testStrategy: Run accessibility audits, test with screen readers, verify keyboard navigation, and check color contrast compliance

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize application for speed and efficiency
tasks.details: Implement performance optimizations including code splitting, lazy loading, image optimization, and Core Web Vitals improvements. Target page load time under 3 seconds.
tasks.testStrategy: Run performance audits, verify Core Web Vitals scores, and test loading times across different devices and connections

tasks.title: SEO Implementation
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive search engine optimization
tasks.details: Add meta tags, structured data (schema markup), XML sitemap, and optimize for search engines. Target SEO score above 95.
tasks.testStrategy: Run SEO audits, verify meta tags are correct, check structured data, and test sitemap generation

tasks.title: Analytics Setup
tasks.description: Configure user behavior tracking with privacy compliance
tasks.details: Set up analytics to track user behavior while maintaining privacy compliance. Include GDPR-compliant tracking and proper consent management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify analytics tracking works, check privacy compliance, and test consent management

tasks.title: Production Deployment Setup
tasks.description: Configure production environment and deployment pipeline
tasks.details: Set up production deployment on Vercel or similar platform, configure custom domain with SSL certificate, and establish deployment pipeline with proper environment variables.
tasks.testStrategy: Test production deployment, verify SSL certificate, check custom domain configuration, and test all functionality in production environment

tasks.title: Cross-browser Testing
tasks.description: Test application across different browsers and devices
tasks.details: Test the application across different browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge), devices (mobile, tablet, desktop), and screen sizes to ensure consistent functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on multiple browsers and devices, verify responsive design works correctly, and check for any browser-specific issues

tasks.title: Content Review and Optimization
tasks.description: Review and optimize all content for clarity and impact
tasks.details: Review all written content for clarity, impact, and alignment with Peace Hub's mission. Optimize copy for better engagement and conversion.
tasks.testStrategy: Review content with stakeholders, test readability, and verify messaging aligns with organizational goals

tasks.title: Security Audit and Hardening
tasks.description: Conduct security audit and implement security best practices
tasks.details: Conduct security audit, implement security headers, validate all inputs, secure API keys, and follow security best practices for web applications.
tasks.testStrategy: Run security scans, verify input validation, check API key security, and test for common vulnerabilities

tasks.title: Documentation and Handover
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for maintenance and future development
tasks.details: Create technical documentation, user guides, and maintenance procedures. Include setup instructions, deployment guides, and troubleshooting information.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and accuracy, test setup instructions, and verify all procedures work as documented

tasks.title: Final Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing and quality assurance before launch
tasks.details: Perform comprehensive testing including functional testing, performance testing, accessibility testing, and user acceptance testing. Fix any issues found and prepare for launch.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute all test plans, verify all functionality works correctly, and get stakeholder approval for launch
